About Me

Hello, and welcome to my portfolio. I’m Agyei Lomini, a dedicated game developer with a degree in Computer Science and a minor in Game Design and Development from Georgia State University.

My academic background has provided me with a solid foundation in coding, problem-solving, and crafting interactive experiences. I am passionate about creating immersive games that captivate and engage players.

On this site, you will find a curated selection of my game development projects, a showcase of my technical skills, and insights into my professional journey. Whether designing innovative gameplay mechanics, building immersive environments, or optimizing performance, I thrive on transforming creative ideas into engaging interactive experiences.
